title: Ticket support isnt answering
body: Hi guys of riot . I have been no warned about how many times i could try to enter a credit card number and now its blocked for 24 hours. My question is can you unblock my account from buying rp? It was'nt activated yet but now its working and i want to buy for 70$ of riot points ... Maybe you should warne people when they attempt it . I was spamming it because i wanted to know WHEN the card would be activated lol... 24 hours suspends lol wtf.

replies.body: What does it take to unlock it . i want to pass the test lets go move up do you work

I can see this timeout happen if a purchase keeps failing, and while the wait sucks it's also good to make sure your account information isn't being compromised or abused.  I looked into this for you and confirmed that your ticket has been received.  Unfortunately, I see continuous replies in your ticket which can return you back to the bottom of the queue.  Our volume is a bit high right now, so it may be a bit before a reply.  Hang on until then, and our billing team will help out!
